meanings.definition: To act as a caddie for a golfer.
meanings.sent1: He caddied for his friend during the golf game.
meanings.sent2: She caddied for the professional golfer on the course.
meanings.sent3: The dog caddied for the cat in the mini-golf tournament.
meanings.sent4: Her shadow caddied for her, always by her side on the green.
meanings.sent5: The helpful robot caddied for the elderly man, carrying his clubs with ease.
